original_text: The prophets speak messages that are not true. The priests make their own rules for people to obey. And my people love to live like this! But when all this comes to an end, my people will be helpless!’ The prophets speak messages that are not true.
korean_text: 선지자들은 거짓을 예언하며 제사장들은 자기 권력으로 다스리며 내 백성은 그것을 좋게 여기니 마지막에는 너희가 어찌하려느냐

sentences.original_text: The priests make their own rules
And my people love to live like this
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 백성들은 이렇게 사는 것을 사랑합니다

sentences.original_text: But when all this comes to an end
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 모든 것이 끝날 때

sentences.original_text: The prophets speak messages that are not true
